name: anytype-ts-bindings
description: protobuf TS bindings for Anytype middleware library

scripts.build:ts: pbjs -t static-module -w commonjs -o build/ts/commands-native.js ./pb/protos/*.proto ./pb/protos/service/*.proto /service/*.proto ./vendor/github.com/anytypeio/go-anytype-library/pb/model/protos/*.proto && ./node_modules/.bin/pbts -o build/ts/commands.d.ts build/ts/commands.js ./vendor/github.com/anytypeio/go-anytype-library/pb/model/protos/*.proto
